name: Exploring Saigon Nightlife - Traditional Art Show, Authentic Cuisine, City Walk, Street Coffee, Night Flower Market
description: This trip will be a night full of unique and interesting experience at each place we take you to, such as watching traditional water puppetry, tasting delicious night food, taking part in the fast-paced lifestyle of Saigon with a nice walk, sipping authentic Vietnamese coffee, and getting lost in Ho Thi Ky flower market at midnight.
